message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is typically called "Depreciation" in financial statements.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see that there is a line item specifically labeled "Depreciation" with a value of 138957.79 on 2024-02-05.

Depreciation represents the allocation of an asset's cost over its useful life, which matches the description in the task. This is the value I need to extract.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '138957.79'}}
```
